inclusion.criterion: Bethesda VI fine needle aspiration (FNA) thyroid or FNA proven PTC metastasis (primary or recurrence).
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Scheduled to undergo central and/or lateral lymph node dissection with or without thyroidectomy as discussed in the Multi-Disciplinary Thyroid Board.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Mentally competent person who is able and willing to comply with study procedures.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Advanced stage thyroid cancer not suitable for surgical resection
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has metastatic papillary thyroid cancer and is scheduled to undergo central and/or lateral lymph node dissection with or without thyroidectomy. However, they have a history of high bleed risk due to proximity to trachea and recurrent laryngeal nerve, which may be a concern for surgical resection.
